member.name: D3D10_MAP_FLAG
member.summary: Specifies how the CPU should respond when Map is called on a resource being used by the GPU.

member.name: D3D10_MAP_FLAG.D3D10_MAP_FLAG_DO_NOT_WAIT
member.summary: Specifies that Map should return DXGI_ERROR_WAS_STILL_DRAWING when the GPU blocks the CPU from accessing a resource.
